m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen Fuel Cell Cars More Viable With Cheaper, More Efficient Electrolysis?
m_szDocSumamry: Hydrogen Fuel Cell Cars More Viable With Cheaper, More Efficient Electrolysis? Email This Page To (separate emails with commas) Message (optional) Your email was sent successfully. Close 24 4,248 views Jul 25, 2013 Follow Antony Enlarge Photo Whatever you think of hydrogen-powered vehicles, recent technology-sharing deals have shown the automakers themselves are beginning to push towards fuel cell vehicles. Among other issues, it's hydrogen's production causing a few issues for the burgeoning industry--it's neither very efficient, nor suitably cheap. Both these factors are now about to change-
